description: [Snip3](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1086) can download and execute additional payloads and modules over separate communication channels.(Citation: Morphisec Snip3 May 2021)(Citation: Telefonica Snip3 December 2021)

external_references.description: Jornet, A. (2021, December 23). Snip3, an investigation into malware. Retrieved September 19, 2023.
Lorber, N. (2021, May 7). Revealing the Snip3 Crypter, a Highly Evasive RAT Loader. Retrieved September 13, 2023.
